How Our AI Generates Insurance Leads

Step-by-step breakdown of our proprietary MCP (Model Context Protocol) system

Intelligent Prospect Discovery

Our AI scans 247 business databases that need insurance. It analyzes business directories, new business filings, permit applications, and industry databases to find companies with specific risk profiles.

AI Search Process:

  • Scanning new business registrations in target zip codes...
  • Found 47 new construction companies this week
  • Cross-referencing with permit databases...
  • Identified 23 companies without current GL coverage
  • Prioritizing by revenue and employee count...

Weekly Discovery Results:

  • 1,200+ Businesses Scanned ‚úì
  • 300+ Qualified Prospects ‚úì
  • 75+ High-Priority Leads ‚úì

Advanced Lead Qualification

The AI analyzes each prospect using 50+ data points including company size, industry risk factors, growth indicators, and insurance requirements. It scores leads based on likelihood to purchase and policy value potential.

Qualification Analysis:

  • ABC Construction - Score 94/100
  • Revenue: $2.3M annually | Employees: 15
  • Risk Factors: High-value equipment, multiple job sites
  • Current Coverage: Basic GL only (under-insured)
  • Purchase Probability: 87% | Est. Premium: $24K

Qualification Accuracy:

  • 92% Lead Quality Score A+
  • 67% Contact Rate High
  • 23% Meeting Conversion Excellent

Personalized Outreach Generation

For each qualified prospect, the AI creates personalized outreach messages based on their specific industry, company size, and risk profile. It crafts compelling subject lines, email content, and follow-up sequences.

Generated Email Example:

Subject: Construction Insurance Gap - ABC Construction

Hi [First Name],

I noticed ABC Construction has been growing rapidly with recent projects in [City]. With 15 employees and $2.3M revenue, you're likely facing increased insurance requirements from GCs.

Many construction companies your size are missing critical coverages like Cyber Liability and Professional Indemnity. A recent claim in your industry cost $360K...

I'd like to show you how to close these gaps while potentially reducing your overall premium...

Outreach Performance:

  • 34% Open Rate Industry: 21%
  • 18% Reply Rate Industry: 3%
  • $47K Avg Weekly Pipeline Generated
